body:
too much ntr on this day

kinda boring to read adult content
This one feels boring, but I do like the dominance antag showed by talking to weak nigga from the veranda as he had weak niggas girl Givin him that slop. That was kinda funny

@ZGundam64 Passive aggresive vanilla fans never dissappoint. Want some spice ? would be better if chad gets her pregnant and also gets the girl's mother pregnant too. All while  cuckMcboyfriend can throw himself in a ditch. 10/10 NTR would buy 10 copies.
Is it just me or is nhentai dying?

We need to add some spice to NTR. Have the boyfriend find out and either catch them in the act and give her the ultimatum and leave her if she will not answer, or use her phone to text the guy to meet her(him) somewhere and bash his head in with a baseball bat and he gets his girl back.
I love the art but just another typical shitty NTRash story.
